title: Rioters vs OCE Community 5v5?
body:
Hey everyone, 
What do you guys think about organising something like this again?

Maybe have it all live-streamed and with voice chat? It'll be a nice way to finish the season for OCE after we just witnessed an amazing Worlds Championship?

Cheers everyone!

replies.body:
Or maybe we could mix up the teams a little bit? 3R and 2C vs 2R and 3C? 

Make it happen Sephyre.
